third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Paul Linn is the favorite due to his recent progress and performance against Lachlan. Rustam Babaiev is professional but coming back from injury.

Rustam Babaiev.strength: Professional and strong, but coming back from injury.
Rustam Babaiev.health: Recovering from injury, claims to be in good shape.
Rustam Babaiev.previous_match_summary: Lost to Paul Linn previously and then to Irakli.

Paul Linn.strength: Very strong with good progress in the last year.
Paul Linn.previous_match_summary: Performed well against Lachlan and has improved since his last match with Rustam.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Prudnik is smart and knows how to pull against Todd. He won easily last time they pulled.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Lost easily to Prudnik last time.

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Smart and strong, knows how to handle Todd.
Evgeny Prudnik.health: Coming back from injury, first right arm match in 20 months.
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Won easily against Todd last time.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Dave Chaffee is too much for Frank due to his pressure and side pressure. Frank is a good guy but may not be able to take Dave's wrist.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Very strong with good pressure and side pressure.
Dave Chaffee.health: Coming back from a break, expected to be in good shape.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Last match was six months ago against Laletin.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry is favored to win due to psychological advantage and support in the USA. He can stop Alex's moves.
John is expected to win but it won't be easy. Leonidas is strong but John can find a way to win.

John Brzenk.strength: Experienced and can adapt his style.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Beat Alex Voivoda in a surprising match.

Leonidas Arkona.strength: Strong and becoming more of an armwrestler.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Dangerous match, could go either way.
